documents.document: RT @hildabast: Didn't have this on my Covid bingo card... The EMA is evaluating a Chinese inactivated vaccine - Sinovac's CoronaVac.

"Men egentligen ska inte deras auktoritet spela en avgrande roll, utan i stllet en genuin vilja att ta till sig ny kunskap genom en prestigels, prvande sakdiskussion fr att uppn goda resultat." Just s. https://t.co/Wq1WahyVO4

Tegnell: "svrare ... n vad ngon hade trott". https://t.co/3hupblif0Y Nej, helt vntat om man (i) frstr grundlggande spridningsdynamik: https://t.co/NN7sPBtIvE Eller (ii) kan analysera data (liknande mindre omfattande data fanns att tillg innan hstens felbedmningar): https://t.co/hSfjM9rWId
@neverklap @ConanZeBavarian Du kan registrera dig hr: https://t.co/fLS0TWGQRG
Come join us, we are sending live tonight at 8pm (Central European Time): https://t.co/3FCTAkAbQR https://t.co/Jsi5D3TjmV
The longer one waits, the harder it gets, but it's not impossible - even now. #bytStrategiNu #YesToNoCovid

We are certain that when we look back in a few years, the countries with the best outcomes will be those which decided to act quickly in the very beginning, those which decided to trace down and stop all infection chains.

In our #ZeroCovidDayOfAction webinar on April 10th: https://t.co/UKrd6dzoA2, we explained yet again why suppression and aiming for #NoCovid / #ZeroCovid is the most sensible, most scientific and most ethical strategy for protecting health AND economy.
We have warned early about the tsunami of new cases awaiting us with the new mutations: https://t.co/VvIE6taNXu
On 26th January, we hosted a webinar with one of the most known virologists in the world Robert Gallo: https://t.co/aUUDbelfb5
On 12th January this year, we discussed the John-Snow Memorandum (vs. Great Barrington Declaration) with Deepti Gurdasani @dgurdasani1: https://t.co/Msy8mybATj
In December 2020, we discussed the spread of SARS-Cov-2 among children and in schools with Anders W. Johnson @anderswjonsson @Centerpartiet: https://t.co/n2PpqiKCf5
On 8th October 2020, Anders Vahlne was the guest in a webinar with the Swedish American Chamber of Commerce, San Francisco Silicon Valley (@SACCSFSV): https://t.co/qfndpuuz39

Again again, we raised attention to #longCovid and that it should weigh into the #Covid19 strategy choice: https://t.co/GeBAOJ5FaG https://t.co/XZacqkPZ4k https://t.co/BNFXBmNamI @killedbyproxy @KnegStrateg @noren_elisabeth @covidforeningen
In August 2020, we asked Swedish politicians and other stakeholders to join @WHOs #WearAMask #FacemaskChallenge: https://t.co/9qDkGQTsVP

Again again, we raised attention to airborne transmission and transmission via (pre-/asymptomatic) people without symptoms. Here, we discuss the importance of facemasks with @trishgreenhalgh: https://t.co/bOO9tuF5EP
With an article in USA today, we warned other countries to not make the same mistakes as #Sweden did: https://t.co/HAPzxTFtYN

In July 2020, we had @yaneerbaryam from the New England Complex Systems Institute @necsi @endCOVID19 as guest: https://t.co/KdkssFiVJI. He has been advocating for a #ZeroCovid strategy from the beginning.

As we realized how difficult it was to communicate #Covid19 science in #Sweden, we decided to start a non-profit organization in June 2020 (https://t.co/531yBgybIt). In September 2020, we opened up for associate membership (https://t.co/IufxpUz5r6). We are 650+ members now.

What many people dont know: 27 articles were published (either by single members or in different constellations) even before our famous 14th April 2020 article. You can find all our articles here: https://t.co/YYMhuoosmx

about a more science-based ethical suppression strategy to combat #Covid19 in #Sweden. After a year (and several dozens of debate articles later), it's a good time to look back and reflect with another article, published today: https://t.co/zQDBzX4ncr

Anniversary thread Swedish Science Forum Covid-19 1 year ago today, our debate article was published in the Swedish newspaper @dagensnyheter and caused quite some stir: https://t.co/yBbKC2hN8U although the only thing we wanted to achieve was an open and honest discussion >
Vi snder live igen ikvll kl. 20:00: https://t.co/3FCTAkAbQR https://t.co/T66qbE40yB
Ju lngre man vntar, desto svrare blir det, men det r inte omjligt - inte ens nu. #bytStrategiNu #svpol

Vi r fortfarande skra p att nr vi tittar tillbaka om ngra r kommer de lnder som har de bsta resultaten att vara de som beslutade att agera snabbt i brjan, de som bestmde sig fr att spra och stoppa alla infektionskedjor.

I vrt #ZeroCovidDayOfAction-webinar den 10 april: https://t.co/UKrd6dzoA2 frklarade vi n en gng varfr undertryckande och siktning mot #NoCovid / #ZeroCovid r den mest frnuftiga, mest vetenskapliga och mest etiska strategin fr att skydda hlsa OCH ekonomi.
Vi har tidigt varnat fr tsunamin av nya fall som vntar oss med de nya mutationerna: https://t.co/VvIE6taNXu
Den 26 januari arrangerade vi ett webinar med en av de mest knda virologerna i vrlden Robert Gallo: https://t.co/aUUDbelfb5
Den 20 januari bjd Stefan Sauk @sauk_stefan in oss till en hearing: https://t.co/c7vB2gwOjU
Den 12 januari i r diskuterade vi John-Snow Memorandum (vs. Great Barrington Declaration) med Deepti Gurdasani @dgurdasani1: https://t.co/Msy8mybATj
I december 2020 diskuterade vi spridningen av SARS-Cov-2 bland barn och i skolor med @anderswjonsson @Centerpartiet: https://t.co/n2PpqiKCf5
Den 8 oktober 2020 var Anders Vahlne gst i ett webinar med Svenska amerikanska handelskammaren, San Francisco och Silicon Valley (@SACCSFSV): https://t.co/qfndpuuz39

terigen och igen uppmrksammade vi #longCovid och att det skulle vga in i #Covid19-strategivalet: https://t.co/GeBAOJ5FaG https://t.co/XZacqkPZ4k https://t.co/BNFXBmNamI @killedbyproxy @KnegStrateg @noren_elisabeth
I augusti 2020 bad vi svenska politiker och andra intressenter att g med i @WHO:s #WearAMask #FacemaskChallenge: https://t.co/9qDkGQTsVP
terigen uppmrksammade vi smitta via mnniskor utan symtom (pre- / asymptomatisk). Hr diskuterade vi vikten av ansiktsmasker med @trishgreenhalgh: https://t.co/bOO9tuF5EP
I juli 2020 hade vi @yaneerbaryam frn New England Complex Systems Institute @necsi @endCOVID19 som gst: https://t.co/KdkssFiVJI. Han har fresprkat en #ZeroCovid-strategi frn brjan.

Nr vi insg hur svrt det var att kommunicera #Covid19-vetenskapen bestmde vi oss fr att starta en ideell frening i juni 2020 (https://t.co/FK0bslGAzd). I september 2020 ppnade vi fr associerat medlemskap: https://t.co/IufxpUz5r6. Tillsammans r vi nu ver 650 medlemmar.

Vad mnga inte vet: 27 artiklar publicerades (antingen av enskilda medlemmar eller i olika konstellationer) fre den 14 april 2020. Du hittar alla p vr webbplats: https://t.co/YYMhuoosmx (blddra till botten).
Efter ett r r det lge att se tillbaka och reflektera som vi gr i en ny artikel, publicerad idag: https://t.co/zQDBzX4ncr

Fr 1 r sedan idag publicerades vr debattartikel i @dagensnyheter: https://t.co/yBbKC2hN8U orsakade en del uppstndelse ven om det enda vi ville uppn var en ppen rlig diskussion om en mer vetenskaplig etisk undertryckningsstrategi fr att bekmpa #Covid19 i #Sverige.
